Literature.Title: Design and syntheses of gramicidin S analogs, cyclo(-X-Leu-X-D-Phe-Pro-)2 (X=His, Lys, Orn, Dab and Dap).
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Fujinuma K, Harada T, Takanashi K, Shindo M, Kimura M, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=>100µg/ml)
